tag_list: about--jay-katari, recycling--jay-katari, jay-katari, introduction-of-jay-katari, facebook, twitter, google
overview:
Jay Katari is 38 years old and I live in Boca Raton, Florida with my wife Kimberly and my four children. I was born in Hamilton, Ontario, Canada. Jay is a 2nd degree black belt in Tae Kwon Do. He has travelled extensively in the Caribbean, and South America while developing new markets to sell second hand clothing.

Jay Katari went to Florida State University and has been for fourteen years. Jay is a third generation 2nd hand clothing business owner and has worked closely with charities supporting the poor and underprivileged for many years.

video_embeds.description: Jay Katari is a social entrepreneur and a successful businessman in South Florida specializing in used clothing collection and recycling.
